title: ICE Compiler Panicks while compiling exa

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: A-parser
labels.description: Area: The parsing of Rust source code to an AST.

labels.name: A-macros
labels.description: Area: All kinds of macros (custom derive, macro_rules!, proc macros, ..)

body:
Trying to compile via 'cargo build' the latest master of  the crate https://github.com/ogham/exa results in a ICE.

I tried this code:

``` bash
$ cargo build
```

I expected to see this happen: 

The crate to compile successfully.

Instead, this happened: got an ICE.

Complete output here: -> https://gist.github.com/goyox86/e442adca31c1626badcc
## Meta

`rustc --version --verbose`: 

rustc 1.3.0-nightly (e6596d005 2015-06-30)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: e6596d0052e79e6393bbee3538bb122930d89887
commit-date: 2015-06-30
host: x86_64-apple-darwin
release: 1.3.0-nightly
